כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֒ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <S%H2388><s%> be strong יְדֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> Let your hands הַשֹּֽׁמְעִים֙ <S%H8085><s%> ye that hear בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> in these days הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <S%H1697><s%> these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> to these מִפִּי֙ <S%H6310><s%> by the mouth הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> of the prophets אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> who בְּי֞וֹם <S%H3117><s%> which [were] in the day יֻסַּ֨ד <S%H3245><s%> was laid בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts הַהֵיכָ֖ל <S%H1964><s%> that the temple לְהִבָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1129><s%> might be built
